item.title: Change
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

For Attack search case 823:

Underneath you should see something like this if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You begin gaining Attack exp by kicking the dummy!"); setAnimation(1746); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 45; } break;

To change the Attack experience given, change the 50* It may be a different number, it still works the same.

For Strength search case 1531:

You should see something below it like this if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You begin gaining Strength exp by doing star-jumps!"); actionTimer = 45; setAnimation(2761); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break; To change the Strength experience given, change the 50* It may be a different number, it still works the same.

For Defence search case 299:

Underneath you should see something like this if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You begin gaining Defence exp by jumping around like crazy!"); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 45; setAnimation(2306); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break; To change the Defence experience given, change the 50* It may be a different number, it still works the same.

Read full topic
